definitions.definition: A person from India, varying historically from the entire subcontinent to India north of the Deccan , especially the plains of the Ganges and Jumna.

main_definition: A person from India, varying historically from the entire subcontinent to India north of the Deccan , especially the plains of the Ganges and Jumna.

definitions.definition: The pluricentric language of Hindi-Urdu , of which Hindi and Urdu are literary standards ; the language from which Hindi and Urdu are derived.
The Delhi dialect of that language.
The language which is now known as Urdu .
The language which is now known as Hindi .

main_definition: The pluricentric language of Hindi-Urdu , of which Hindi and Urdu are literary standards ; the language from which Hindi and Urdu are derived.
secondary_definitions: The Delhi dialect of that language.
( historical ) The language which is now known as Urdu .
( historical ) The language which is now known as Hindi .
